text: Hi. Does anyone know… is it possible to create a list within CMS Starter and show some entries - for instance, all the contacts within a list or with a certain property? I was looking into the CRM object but i get: “There was a problem loading your CRM object field; The CRM object type “contact” is restricted in public content. Please make this content private or contact the module creator.” Do I do a mistake or is it the Starter edition.
